Case Study

New2SATX

Local moving & relocation guide

Launched the brand’s first site with guided IA, SEO, and analytics so the new business starts strong online.

Visit live site

Challenge

What they needed

A new business needed guidance and execution on building their first digital presence.

Approach

How we solved it

Guided them through site structure and layout, implemented SEO and analytics setup using Google tools.

Completed

October 2022
